update `t_driver_information_manage` SET is_delete = 1, update_user = #{updateUser} where `driver_code` in
#{item}
mapper.select: SELECT tdriver.NAME driverName, tdriver.phone driverPhone, tdriver.driver_acc driverAcct, tdriver.driver_pass driverPass, tdriver.driver_idcard driverIdCard, datas.name1 driverProvinceName, datas.name2 driverCityName, datas.dict_name driverDistinctName FROM t_driver_information_manage tdriver RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT t3.name1, t3.code1, t3.name2, t3.code2, t4.dict_name, t4.dict_code FROM ( SELECT t1.dict_code code1, t1.dict_name name1, t1.dict_parent_node parentcode1, t2.dict_code code2, t2.dict_name name2, t2.dict_parent_node parentcode2 FROM t_dict t1 LEFT JOIN t_dict t2 ON t1.dict_code = t2.dict_parent_node WHERE t1.dict_parent_node IS NULL ) t3 LEFT JOIN t_dict t4 ON t3.code2 = t4.dict_parent_node ) datas ON tdriver.is_delete = 0 AND tdriver.driver_code = #{driverCode} AND tdriver.provinceCode = datas.code1 AND tdriver.cityCode = datas.code2 AND tdriver.distinctCode = datas.dict_code HAVING driverName IS NOT NULL

and t_driver_information_manage.name like concat('%',#{driverName},'%')
and t_driver_information_manage.driver_code like concat('%',#{driverCode},'%')
